column4: hello, i be a newbie...just installed ubuntu from a disk a friend gave me...hoary hedgehog...cute name...but can't see other partitions on laptop disk, but could see other partition on desktop..also is there a way to upgrade to latest ubuntu without losing any data...i said i was a newbie so u can stop laughing any time u want...:-)  lol
perhaps you should try a newer version.. !gutsy is the latest and greatest
open a browser, go to http://www.ubuntu.com .. you can figure it out from there
there are tutorials out there for using gcc... I think there is a bunch of links on the gnu site
